Our Earthcasting paper has been published in AGU's Earth's Future and selected as an Editor's Highlight.

Our (National Center for Earth-surface Dynamics (NCED) postdoctoral team and mine) Earthcasting paper has been recently published in AGU’s Earth’s Future. It is also selected as an Editor’s Highlight. The paper is available in this (open-access) link: https://doi.org/10.1029/2021EF002088



Behrooz Ferdowsi
Assistant Professor of Civil and Environmental Engineering
Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering
Office: N115 Engineering Building 1

The Land on which the University of Houston stands is part of the ancient homeland and traditional territory of the Karankawa, Atakapa-Ishak, Coahuiltecan, and the Sana people. We pay respect to Karankawa, Atakapa-Ishak, Coahuiltecan, and the Sana peoples past, present, and future and their continuing presence in the homeland and throughout their diasporas.
